/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Several overpasses stretch across the street, hinting at the city's extensive infrastructure. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the overpasses and gives a sense of depth to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes contrasting beautifully with the blue sky.
